Tokens.ability_afterburn_desc: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. {s:hero_name}'s bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.
Tokens.ability_afterburn_quip: Shoot enemies to set them on fire
Tokens.ability_blood_bomb_desc:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
Tokens.ability_blood_bomb_quip: Sacrifice some health to launch a damaging bomb
Tokens.ability_blood_bomb_t3_desc: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing {s:BloodSpillDPSPercent}% of the original damage per second, for {s:BloodSpillDuration}s.
Tokens.ability_blood_shards_desc: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
Tokens.ability_blood_shards_quip: Stack damage amplification on an enemy
Tokens.ability_blood_shards_t2_desc: +{s:HealthToDamage} Health To Damage and +{s:VulnerabilityPerStack}% Damage Amp
Tokens.ability_bounce_pad_desc:
Drop a bounce pad in the world that sends you and other heroes flying. You will Stomp on landing, dealing damage to any nearby enemies.

The Stomp can only occur once per Bounce Pad.
Tokens.ability_bounce_pad_t1_desc: You and allies gain a +{s:SpeedOnLand}m/s move speed bonus for {s:SpeedOnLandDuration}s on landing
Tokens.ability_bounce_pad_t2_desc: +{s:StompDamage} Stomp Damage with improved scaling
Tokens.ability_bullet_flurry_desc: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Spirit Damage.
Tokens.ability_bullet_flurry_quip: Unleash a flurry of bullets around you
Tokens.ability_burrow_desc: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.
Tokens.ability_burrow_quip: Travel underground, emerging with spin damage
Tokens.ability_cadence_charm_desc:
Glance in a target direction, dealing Damage to the first enemy hit and marking them.

If the victim was already marked, they instead take additional Damage and become Charmed.

Charmed enemies are forced to run towards you, but at reduced speeds.
Tokens.ability_cadence_tempo_bullet_desc: Casting an ability empowers your next {s:MaxProcCount} bullets. Empowered bullets deal bonus Damage and reduce all your Cooldowns .
Tokens.ability_charged_shot_desc: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [{s:ability_key}] or [{s:iv_attack}] to hold the shot.
Tokens.ability_charged_shot_quip: Charge up a long range shot
Tokens.ability_charged_shot_t3_desc: Improved damage scaling and {s:AbilityCooldownBetweenCharge}s Charge Delay
Tokens.ability_crackshot_desc:
Headshots deal bonus Weapon damage and applies a Fading Slow. This effect can only occur when off cooldown.

Crackshot ignores range damage fall-off.
Tokens.ability_crackshot_quip: Deals bonus damage and applies a slow with Headshots
Tokens.ability_empowerbullet_desc:
Performing a Dash or Slide loads your weapon with an empowered bullet that deals bonus Damage, equal to a percentage of your Weapon Damage.

If you're out of bullets, you'll find an extra one. How lucky.
Tokens.ability_empowerbullet_t1_desc: Gain +{s:BonusMoveSpeed} m/s Move Speed while empowered
Tokens.ability_empowerbullet_t2_desc: Deal an additional +{s:BulletArmorReduction}% weapon damage for {s:DebuffDuration}s against the victim
Tokens.ability_explosive_barrel_desc: Place a barrel that explodes when shot, or on landing after launched via melee attack or bounce pad. Has a minimum arm time before it can explode.
Tokens.ability_explosive_barrel_quip: Throw a barrel that explodes when shot
Tokens.ability_fire_bomb_desc: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.
Tokens.ability_fire_bomb_quip: Stun all nearby enemies after a short delay
Tokens.ability_fire_bomb_t3_desc: +{s:Damage} Damage and {s:LifeStealPercentOnHit}% lifesteal from enemy heroes hit
Tokens.ability_flame_dash_desc:
Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains {s:SlowResistancePercent}% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to dash faster.
Tokens.ability_flame_dash_quip: Blaze forward, leaving a flame trail in your wake
Tokens.ability_flame_dash_t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and {s:AbilityCooldown}s Ability Cooldown
Tokens.ability_gravity_lasso_desc:
Grab an enemy with your lasso and drag them along behind you. The enemy is stunned and Astro is slowed slightly during the lasso.

Lasso duration is paused for {s:BouncePadExtendDuration}s during the first usage of a bounce pad.
Tokens.ability_gravity_lasso_quip: Grab an enemy and drag them behind you
Tokens.ability_gravity_lasso_t3_desc: Can lasso another enemy inside targetting area
Tokens.ability_guided_arrow_desc:
After {s:AbilityCastDelay}s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate the owl.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
Tokens.ability_guided_arrow_quip: Fly your owl to damage enemies from afar
Tokens.ability_guided_arrow_t3_desc: After hit, kills enemies that are below {s:LowHealthEnemyThresholdPct}% Health
Tokens.ability_gunslinger_demon_carbine_desc: Load your weapon with demonic rounds. After a delay, you empower your next shots to deal bonus damage and penetrate enemies.
Tokens.ability_gunslinger_salvo_desc:
Load your weapon with demonic rounds. After a delay, release a blitz of bullets at the target enemy, dealing bonus Damage.

Enemies can intercept the bullets.
Tokens.ability_gunslinger_spreadingfire_desc:
Throw a projectile, infused with an imp's spirit. It posseses the enemy, dealing Damage over time.

If the target dies while possessed, the imp jumps to another nearby enemy, refreshing its duration.
Tokens.ability_gunslinger_spreadingfire_t3_desc: +{s:DPS} DPS. Spreads to +{s:SpreadTargets} targets after death.
Tokens.ability_hat_trick_desc: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
Tokens.ability_hat_trick_quip: Throws her hat strike and reveal enemies
Tokens.ability_health_swap_desc: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
Tokens.ability_health_swap_quip: Swap your current health with an enemy hero's
Tokens.ability_ice_dome_desc:
{s:hero_name} freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.
Tokens.ability_ice_dome_t3_desc: +{s:BonusHealthRegen} Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power
Tokens.ability_ice_grenade_desc: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.
Tokens.ability_ice_grenade_t2_desc: Frost Grenade now heals {s:HealAmount} HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.
Tokens.ability_icebeam_desc: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced move speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
Tokens.ability_icebeam_t3_desc: Fires {s:BeamSplitCount} additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within {s:BeamSplit}m of the last target hit
Tokens.ability_icepath_desc:
{s:hero_name} creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains {s:SlowResistancePercent}% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press [{s:key_innate_1}] / [{s:key_duck}] to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
Tokens.ability_icepath_quip: Speed around on a floating path of ice
Tokens.ability_icepath_t3_desc: While active, gain +{s:BonusSpiritMeter} Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created.  Max of {s:BonusSpiritMax} Spirit Power
Tokens.ability_immobilize_trap_desc:
Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Curse and Movement Slow that interrupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage.
Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.
Tokens.ability_immobilize_trap_quip: Place a trap that restricts enemy movement
Tokens.ability_immobilize_trap_t3_desc: {s:hero_name} deals +{s:BulletVulnerbility}% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by Spirit Snare for {s:DebuffDuration}s
Tokens.ability_incendiary_projectile_desc: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage {s:hero_name} does to them.
Tokens.ability_incendiary_projectile_quip: Spew napalm that amplifies your damage
Tokens.ability_intimidate_desc: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
Tokens.ability_intimidate_quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing from each hit
Tokens.ability_intimidate_t3_desc: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets {s:hero_name} deal +{s:DamageBonus}% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts {s:DebuffDuration}s.
Tokens.ability_lash_flog_desc: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.
Tokens.ability_lash_flog_quip: Lifesteal from targets ahead of you
Tokens.ability_lash_flog_t3_desc: +{s:Damage} Damage and applies {s:FireRateSlow}% Fire Rate Slow
Tokens.ability_life_drain_desc:
Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your move speed is reduced by half.
[Alt-Cast] to give health to friendly Heroes.
Press [{s:in_ability2}] to cancel.
Tokens.ability_life_drain_quip: Steal health from an enemy over time
Tokens.ability_life_drain_t3_desc: Ability becomes charged and grants +1 Charge
Tokens.ability_magician_animalcurse_desc:
Hex a target, transforming them into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small, but suffer from limited movement speed, increased Incoming Damage, and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.
Tokens.ability_magician_animalcurse_quip: Transform your enemy into a rabbit
Tokens.ability_magician_bigbolt_desc: Prepare three AMAZING bolts of magic. Each bolt applies a Fading Slow and deals Spirit Damage, increased for every bolt fired.
Tokens.ability_magician_bigbolt_t3_desc: +{s:DamagePerShot} Damage Per Bolt. Refund {s:BoltRefundPerKill} Bolt per Kill
Tokens.ability_magician_cloneturret_desc:
Summon an Assistant at the targeted location. The Assistant attacks whenever you fire your weapon, dealing Damage.

While the Assistant is out, you can press [{s:in_ability2}] to swap positions with your Assistant.

Casting Spectral Assistant also reloads your weapon.
Tokens.ability_magician_cloneturret_t3_desc: +{s:BonusFireRate}% Fire Rate and +{s:Damage} Assistant Damage
Tokens.ability_magician_escape_desc:
Blink to the target location. On arrival, briefly gain movement speed and become Invisible.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
[Alt-Cast] Appear in place.
Enemies will not know which cast you performed.
Tokens.ability_magician_magicbolt_desc:
Fire a bolt of magic that deals Damage and applies a Fire Rate Slow. If you have an Assistant, they also cast Vexing Bolt at reduced damage.

Press [{s:in_ability1}] to redirect the bolt towards your crosshairs.
Tokens.ability_magician_magicbolt_quip: Launch a guided bolt of magic
Tokens.ability_magician_magicbolt_t3_desc: +{s:Damage} Damage. Your Assistant casts Vexing Bolt without reductions
Tokens.ability_magician_shadowclone_desc:
Create a Copy of yourself with reduced health and damage. When the clone dies or expires it explodes, dealing Spirit Damage.

The Copy cannot use their Ultimate ability.
Tokens.ability_magician_shadowclone_t3_desc: Copy can cast their Ultimate Ability.
Tokens.ability_magician_stage_desc: Target an enemy. You and the target enemy are bound on Stage, unable to leave. All other characters are pushed out of the radius.
Tokens.ability_nano_pounce_desc:
Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage and slow on nearby enemies.
You may use Pounce on a second target if used within {s:DoublePounceTime}s
Tokens.ability_nano_pounce_t2_desc: Reloads up to {s:ActiveReloadPercent}% of your ammo and applies +{s:FireRateSlow}% Fire Rate Slow.
Tokens.ability_nano_proximity_ritual_desc: Deploy a Statue to track enemies in an area. The Ward will also attack enemies recently damaged by {s:hero_name}. Targeted enemies have reduced healing and heal {s:hero_name} when damaged.
Tokens.ability_nano_proximity_ritual_quip: Deploy a statue that survey's an area
Tokens.ability_nano_proximity_ritual_t1_desc: Statues gain Invisibility when not attacking.
Tokens.ability_nano_proximity_ritual_t3_desc: {s:StatueVictimDamageReduction}% Damage Reduction and {s:HealAmpReceivePenaltyPercent}% Heal Reduction on targets.
Tokens.ability_nano_shadow_step_desc: Mark your enemies and bathe yourself in shadow to strengthen your attacks and make yourself Invisible. Attacking will only temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
Tokens.ability_nano_shadow_step_quip: Enter the shadows to gain the advantage on your enemies
Tokens.ability_nano_shadow_step_t3_desc: Heavy Melee attacks cause Silence for {s:SilenceOnHeavyDuration}s
Tokens.ability_perched_predator_desc:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press [{s:in_ability1}] to manually create the explosion.
Tokens.ability_perched_predator_quip: Send out a Spirit Cat to grab enemies
Tokens.ability_power_jump_desc:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
Alt-Cast for reduced jump height.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to cancel the glide.
Tokens.ability_power_jump_quip: Jump high up in the air and unleash multishots
Tokens.ability_power_jump_t2_desc: While airborne, +{s:WeaponDamageBonus} Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies {s:SlowPercent}% movement slow for {s:SlowDuration}s
Tokens.ability_power_jump_t3_desc: While airborne, +{s:TechLifestealPercent}% Bullet Lifesteal and +{s:BulletLifestealPercent}% Spirit Lifesteal
Tokens.ability_power_surge_desc: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
Tokens.ability_power_surge_quip: Create electric arcs with your shots
Tokens.ability_power_surge_t1_desc: Shock Damage applies {s:TechResistDebuff}% Spirit Resist for {s:DebuffDuration}s
Tokens.ability_power_surge_t3_desc: +{s:DamagePerChain} Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +{s:ChainCount} Max Jumps
Tokens.ability_scrap_blast_desc: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
Tokens.ability_scrap_blast_quip: Shoot a blast of bio mass
Tokens.ability_sleep_dagger_desc: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
Tokens.ability_sleep_dagger_t3_desc: Applies {s:BulletResistReduction}% Bullet Resist and {s:FireRateSlow}% Fire Rate Slow for {s:BulletResistReductionDuration}s on wake-up.
Tokens.ability_smoke_bomb_desc: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility, but using items does not. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
Tokens.ability_smoke_bomb_t2_desc: After invis, gain +{s:BulletLifesteal}% Bullet Lifesteal for {s:PostInvisBuffDuration}s
Tokens.ability_smoke_bomb_t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and Phase out of the world for +{s:PhaseOutDuration}s
Tokens.ability_stacking_damage_desc: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
Tokens.ability_stacking_damage_quip: Deal increasing bullet damage to a target
Tokens.ability_stacking_damage_t1_desc: {s:ProcDamage} Spirit damage and {s:SlowPercent}% slow for {s:SlowDuration}s to target every {s:ProcDamageStackCount} stacks
Tokens.ability_throw_sand_desc: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
Tokens.ability_throw_sand_quip: Disarm enemies in front of you
Tokens.ability_trapper_fear_desc:
Dealing Spirit Damage builds an increasing Slow. Once full, the buildup is consumed to apply an Immobilize and a burst of Spirit Damage.

This effect has a cooldown per target.
Tokens.ability_trapper_poisonjar_desc: Throw a jar that leaves a pool of poison, dealing Damage and Slowing. The pool spreads over time, growing in size.
Tokens.ability_trapper_spidershield_desc: Apply a barrier to a target ally, granting Spirit Shield. As long as the shield holds, it periodically deals Spirit Damage and Slows.
Tokens.ability_trapper_spiderwave_desc:
Release a wave of spectral spiders that chase enemies and explode, dealing Spirit Damage.

Hit enemies are poisoned, temporarily losing Spirit and Spirit Resist. This effect can stack multiple times.
Tokens.ability_trapper_webwall_desc: Create a thread of web between two surfaces. Enemies who touch the web take Damage and are Slowed.
Tokens.ability_ult_combo_desc: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during, or within 3 seconds of Combo ending, you permanently gain max health.
Tokens.ability_ult_combo_quip: Hold the enemy hero in place and pummel them
Tokens.ability_ult_combo_t3_desc: +{s:DPS} Damage Per Second and {s:LifeStealPercentOnHit}% lifesteal
Tokens.ability_viper_debuffdagger_desc: Throw a dagger, dealing Spirit Damage and applying a Fading Slow.
Tokens.ability_viper_debuffdagger_t3_desc: +{s:SlowDuration}s Slow Duration and remove {s:StaminaReduction} Stamina
Tokens.ability_viper_hookdagger_desc: Throw a blade, dealing Spirit Damage. The blade then hooks back, applying Spirit Damage again and applying a Slow.
Tokens.ability_viper_hookdagger_quip: Throw a blade that returns to you
Tokens.ability_viper_petrifybola_desc:
Throw an explosive bola. On exploding, the bola Slows and Damages all enemies in the area.

Enemies in the center of the explosion take additional Damage and are Petrified.

Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
Petrified units break free after blocking enough damage.
Tokens.ability_viper_snakedash_desc: You have increased Slide Distance, can Slide up hills, and can turn faster while Sliding.
Tokens.ability_viper_snakedash_quip: Increase the agility of your Slide
Tokens.ability_viper_snakedash_t3_desc: +{s:SlideResist}% Spirit & Bullet Resist while Sliding
Tokens.ability_viper_ult_desc:
Create a hexed area on the ground. After a delay, ALL units in the cylindrical area are Petrified. Enemies also suffer Spirit Damage.

Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
Petrified units break free after blocking enough damage.
Tokens.ability_viper_ult_quip: Turn both allies and enemies into stone
Tokens.ability_viper_venom_desc:
Inject a target with lethal venom. After a delay the venom triggers, dealing Spirit Damage. The damage is increased by the target's missing health.

Reapplying Venom refreshes the duration.
Venom breaks Petrify before detonating.
Tokens.ability_viper_venom_quip: Inject your enemies with a deadly venom
Tokens.ability_warden_crowd_control_desc: Throw a flask that damages, slows movement, and reduces the weapon damage of enemies it hits.
Tokens.ability_warden_crowd_control_t3_desc: {s:AbilityCooldown}s Cooldown and Weapon Debuff applies {s:FireRateSlow}% Fire Rate Slow
Tokens.ability_warden_high_alert_desc: Gain a spirit shield and bonus move speed.
Tokens.ability_warden_high_alert_quip: Gain a spirit shield and move speed
Tokens.ability_warden_high_alert_t3_desc: +{s:TechShieldPoints} Spirit Shield Health and now scales with Spirit Power
Tokens.ability_warden_lock_down_desc: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
Tokens.ability_warden_lock_down_quip: Curse your target, rooting them if they don't escape
Tokens.ability_warden_lock_down_t3_desc: {s:hero_name} deals +{s:BulletArmorReduction}% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for {s:BulletArmorReductionDuration}s
Tokens.ability_warden_riot_protocol_desc:
After charging for {s:AbilityCastDelay}s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you are have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist. Goes on a reduced cooldown if interrupted while charging.
Tokens.ability_warden_riot_protocol_quip: Emit pulses that steal health from enemies
Tokens.ability_wrecker_salvage_desc: Latches onto an Enemy, damaging them and healing yourself while attached. Targets must be in line of sight and within max range to stay latched. A successful kill also restores a Bio Blast charge.
Tokens.ability_wrecker_salvage_quip: Consume an enemy trooper or neutral
Tokens.ability_wrecker_teleport_desc: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.
Tokens.ability_wrecker_teleport_quip: Launch a flying illusion of yourself, teleporting your real body where the illusion lands
Tokens.ability_wrecker_ultimate_desc: Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.
Tokens.ability_wrecking_ball_desc: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
Tokens.ability_wrecking_ball_quip: Throw a ball of scrap that stuns enemies
Tokens.citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam_desc: Charge up your laser to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.
Tokens.citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam_t3_desc: Hyper Beam heals {s:hero_name} for {s:BeamLifesteal}% of its damage on Heroes. {s:BeamLifestealNonHeroPercent}% on non-hero
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_charge_desc: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by {s:hero_name}. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_charge_quip: Charge into the fray, dragging enemies along
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_charge_t3_desc: +{s:WeaponDamageBonus} Weapon Damage for {s:WeaponPowerIncreaseDuration}s after colliding with an enemy
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_heal_desc: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_heal_quip: Drain health from enemies in front of you
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_leap_desc:
Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to crash down early.
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_leap_quip: Smash into enemies from above, stunning them
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_leap_t2_desc: Gain {s:BonusMaxHealthPerHero} Max HP and {s:BonusFireRatePerHero}% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts {s:LandingBonusesDuration}s.
Tokens.citadel_ability_bull_leap_t3_desc: On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires {s:ImmunityDuration}s after landing.
Tokens.citadel_ability_card_toss_desc: Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_d:
Start charging your weapon and gain increased move speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing [{s:iv_attack2}] while an empowered shot is available.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_q: Charge up your weapon to deal high damage and timestop
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_des: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for {s:hero_name} against the victim.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_qui: Throw a grenade that pulses, dealing damage and slow
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_t3_: +{s:PulseDamage} Pulse Damage and +{s:RadiusIncreasePerPulse}m Radius per pulse.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_swap_desc: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_swap_quip: Swap positions with an enemy hero.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_desc: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will be briefly slowed.
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_quip: Create a wall that greatly slows projectiles
Tokens.citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_t3_desc: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for {s:DebuffDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_fissure_wall_desc:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press [{s:iv_attack}] or [{s:in_ability3}] to erupt the wall early.
Tokens.citadel_ability_fissure_wall_quip: Conjure a wall to block your foes
Tokens.citadel_ability_fissure_wall_t1_desc: Removes {s:StaminaReduction} stamina and amplifies {s:hero_name}'s damage by {s:BonusDamagePercent}% on hit enemies for {s:DebuffDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_fissure_wall_t3_desc: Adds a {s:WallStunDuration}s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall
Tokens.citadel_ability_flying_strike_desc: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
Tokens.citadel_ability_flying_strike_t3_desc: Can Grapple to ally Heroes and +{s:WeaponDamageBonus} Weapon Damage for {s:WeaponPowerIncreaseDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_healing_slash_desc: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
Tokens.citadel_ability_healing_slash_quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing on hit
Tokens.citadel_ability_hook_desc: Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.
Tokens.citadel_ability_hook_quip: Pull in a target to you
Tokens.citadel_ability_hook_t1_desc: Bebop deals {s:BulletAmp}% more weapon damage against hooked enemies for {s:BulletAmpDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_chain_desc: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_chain_quip: Tether your enemies to the ground
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_leap_desc: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_leap_quip: Take flight and empower your weapon
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_snipe_desc: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after {s:TimeToFullCharge}s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than {s:LowHealthEnemyThresholdPct}% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_snipe_quip: Snipe injured targets for massive damage
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_sting_desc: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_sting_quip: Make a target bleed over time
Tokens.citadel_ability_hornet_sting_t1_desc: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within {s:TargetBounceRange}m
Tokens.citadel_ability_infinity_slash_desc:
Become infused with {s:hero_name}'s shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster. You gain immunity to negative status effects and have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
When you get a hero kill, you heal and the duration is extended.
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_desc: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_desc: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_quip: Slam down to the ground, damaging enemies
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_t2_desc: Struck enemies are popped into the air and slowed by {s:EnemySlowPct}% for {s:SlowDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_t3_desc: Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_quip: Use your whip to pull yourself to an enemy
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_t2_desc: +{s:AbilityCastRange}m Cast Range and gain +{s:WeaponDamageBonus} Weapon Damage for {s:WeaponDamageBonusDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_t3_desc: +{s:WeaponFireRateBonus}% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_ultimate_desc:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_ultimate_quip: Lift enemies and smash them into the ground
Tokens.citadel_ability_lash_ultimate_t3_desc: Stun enemies in the landing zone for {s:StunDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_lightning_ball_desc: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
Tokens.citadel_ability_lightning_ball_quip: Launch a damaging ball of lightning
Tokens.citadel_ability_magewalkk_desc:
Briefly become Untargetable before appearing at your destination. Your first {s:EmpoweredAttackCount} attacks deal bonus Spirit Damage.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
[Alt-Cast] Appear in place.
Enemies will not know which cast you performed.
Tokens.citadel_ability_mobile_resupply_desc: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.
Tokens.citadel_ability_mobile_resupply_t1_desc: +{s:AuraFireRateBonus}% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter
Tokens.citadel_ability_nikuman_desc:
While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby.
You can dash and melee without breaking the channel.
Tokens.citadel_ability_nikuman_quip: Heal yourself and those around you
Tokens.citadel_ability_nikuman_t1_desc: Gain +{s:MovementSpeedBonus}m/s movespeed bonus for {s:MovementSpeedBonusDuration}s if Aurora is fully channeled. Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
Tokens.citadel_ability_nikuman_t3_desc: Full move and ability use and additionaly heals +{s:HealMaxHealthPercent}% of Max Health per second
Tokens.citadel_ability_passive_beefy_desc: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.
Tokens.citadel_ability_passive_beefy_quip: Regenerate some of the damage you receive
Tokens.citadel_ability_power_slash_desc:
Channel to increase damage over {s:AbilityCastDelay} seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press [{s:in_ability1}] or [{s:iv_attack}] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
Tokens.citadel_ability_power_slash_quip: Charge up an attack, dealing high damage on a full charge
Tokens.citadel_ability_power_slash_t1_desc: Gain +{s:BulletResist} Bullet Resist while channeling
Tokens.citadel_ability_power_slash_t2_desc: {s:AbilityCooldown}s Ability Cooldown and apply {s:SlowPercent}% movement slow for {s:SlowDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_projectmind_t2_desc: Provides a {s:BulletShieldOnLand} bullet shield for {s:BulletShieldDuration}s on teleport. Shield amount scales with Spirit Power.
Tokens.citadel_ability_psychic_lift_desc: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them into the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.
Tokens.citadel_ability_psychic_lift_quip: Lift an enemy, interrupting and silencing them
Tokens.citadel_ability_psychic_lift_t3_desc: Telekinesis will bounce to an additional nearby target
Tokens.citadel_ability_rocket_barrage_desc: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.
Tokens.citadel_ability_self_vacuum_desc: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them.
Tokens.citadel_ability_self_vacuum_quip: Pull in and stun the enemy team
Tokens.citadel_ability_self_vacuum_t3_desc: Singularity takes {s:DamagePercentHealth}% of the enemies' max health each second.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shieldedsentry_desc:
Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime.
Turrets gain {s:TurretHealthPerBoon}HP per Boon. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shieldedsentry_t2_desc: +{s:TurretAttackRange}m Attack Range and +{s:AttackSpeedMult}% turret fire rate
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_dagger_desc: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_dagger_max_rage_des: Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full knives will ricochet to another enemy and apply a slow to enemies they bleed.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_dagger_quip: Apply stacking bleed to the target
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_dash_desc:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_dash_quip: Dash ahead, damaging all enemies along the path
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_dash_t3_desc: Reduce cooldown by {s:CooldownReductionOnHit}s per enemy hero hit ({s:CooldownReductionOnHitNonHero}s for Non-Hero). Max -{s:MaxCooldownReductionsFromHits}s per Dash.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage_desc: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage_max_ra: Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full the amount of damage deferred is increased.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage_quip: Defer a portion of damage taken
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_active: Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal {s:Damage} damage to them.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_passiv: Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_quip: Travel to a low health hero and instantly kill it
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_t1_des: Gain +{s:BonusMoveSpeed} m/s move speed while at full rage.
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_t2_des: +{s:EnemyHealthPercent}% Enemy Health Threshold and +{s:BuffDamage}% Full Rage Bonus Damage
Tokens.citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_t3_des: Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.
Tokens.citadel_ability_static_charge_desc:
Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
Alt-Cast to cast on yourself.
Tokens.citadel_ability_static_charge_quip: Apply a delayed area stun to an enemy hero
Tokens.citadel_ability_sticky_bomb_desc:
Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.

Gain +{s:BonusDamagePctPerPlayerHit}% bomb damage for every enemy hero hurt.
Gain +{s:BonusDamagePctPerPlayerKilled}% bomb damage for every enemy hero killed within {s:KillCheckWindow}s of taking bomb damage.

Hold [{s:key_alt_cast}] to attach the Sticky Bomb to yourself.
Tokens.citadel_ability_sticky_bomb_quip: Plant a bomb on an enemy
Tokens.citadel_ability_sticky_bomb_t3_desc: On Attach, target deals {s:OutgoingDamagePenaltyPercent}% less damage for {s:DebuffDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_stomp_desc: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.
Tokens.citadel_ability_stomp_quip: Release a ground pulse that knocks enemies into the air
Tokens.citadel_ability_stomp_t1_desc: Hit enemies are fire rate and movement slowed by {s:SlowPercent}% for {s:SlowDuration}s.
Tokens.citadel_ability_stomp_t2_desc: {s:hero_name} deals {s:BulletArmorReduction}% more Weapon Damage to hit enemies for {s:BulletArmorReductionDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_storm_cloud_desc: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
Tokens.citadel_ability_storm_cloud_lightning_st: While channeling, press [{s:iv_attack}] to mark the targeted area to be struck with a powerful lightning bolt that knocks enemies away after a {s:LightningStrikeDelay}s delay. One use per cast.
Tokens.citadel_ability_storm_cloud_quip: Fry all enemies in a large area
Tokens.citadel_ability_storm_cloud_t1_desc: +{s:BulletResistOnActive}% Bullet Resist while channeling Storm Cloud
Tokens.citadel_ability_tangotether_desc: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [{s:in_ability2}] to Lock on to a target
Tokens.citadel_ability_tangotether_quip: Empower yourself and a nearby ally
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_desc:
Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. {s:hero_name} and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals {s:AllyOutgoingDamagePercent}% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
Hold [{s:in_move_down}] at cast to reduce launch height
[{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate flying speed.
[{s:iv_attack2}] to drop ally/bomb.
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_quip: Death from Above!  Fly and drop a bomb (or ally) on enemies
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_t1_desc: {s:AirDropBulletArmorReduction}% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for {s:AirDropDebuff02Duration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_t3_desc: Applies Silence on enemies hit for +{s:AirDropSilenceDuration}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_lightningcrash_des: Jump into the air and start flying for a short time. When you hit the ground you deal damage based on how long you flew, as well as gaining a regeneration boost. You can end your flight and dive early by pressing [{s:iv_attack}].
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form_desc: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form_quip: Turn into impervious stone and stun enemies nearby
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_urn_desc: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.
Tokens.citadel_ability_tengu_urn_quip: Damage and slow enemies in the area
Tokens.citadel_ability_uppercut_desc: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage and fire rate slow where they land. Does not damage allies.
Tokens.citadel_ability_uppercut_t2_desc: On Uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin-up time, 2x range, and +{s:BuffBaseWeaponPct}% weapon damage for {s:UppercutBuffOnHit}s
Tokens.citadel_ability_uppercut_t3_desc: On Uppercut enemy Hero, set Hook cooldown to 0 and instantly +{s:ClipSizeBonus}% bullets to your current clip
Tokens.citadel_ability_void_sphere_desc: {s:hero_name} briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max {s:FireRateBonusDurationMax}s). Can be Alt-Cast to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
Tokens.citadel_ability_void_sphere_quip: Blink in and out of existence
Tokens.citadel_ability_void_sphere_t3_desc: {s:AbilityCooldown}s Ability Cooldown and +{s:BonusClipSizePercent}% Base Ammo when reappearing
Tokens.citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire_desc: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
Tokens.citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire_t3_desc: +{s:BulletLifestealPercent}% Bullet and Spirit Lifesteal and Increased Scaling on Spirit Damage Per Bullet
Tokens.citadel_ability_wrecker_bouldergrenade_d: Create a large ball of scrap, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. Nearby enemies take reduced damage.
Tokens.citadel_ability_wrecker_garbage_suck_des: Create an area that slows nearby enemies and damages them after a channel. Damage scales with total channel time.
Tokens.citadel_weapon_hero_atlas_set_desc: Reloads single shells at a time. Can be interrupted
Tokens.citadel_weapon_hero_bebop_set_desc: Fires a continuous beam with no bullet travel
Tokens.citadel_weapon_hero_forge_set_desc: Increases fire rate as the guns spins up
Tokens.fathom_breach_desc: Launch forward, damaging all enemies near where you land and knocking them into the air.
Tokens.fathom_lurkers_ambush_active_desc: Charge up a mouthful of sticky spit that damages and immobilizes enemies. Hold [{s:ability_key}] to hold the spit. Damage and immobilization duration increase the longer you hold the spit.
Tokens.fathom_lurkers_ambush_passive_desc: Passive: While out of combat and not seen by enemies, heal a portion of your max health every second. If you stand still, you also become invisible, so long as you stay still or crouched and don't perform any actions. While completely invisible, you are invulnerable.
Tokens.fathom_reefdweller_harpoon_desc:
Throw a harpoon that latches to a wall or ceiling, and pulls you in. Activates Lurker's Ambush's invisibility while being pulled in. Once hanging attached to the harpoon surface, gain additional charges.

Casting Reefdweller Harpoon does not break invisibility.
Tokens.fathom_reefdweller_harpoon_passive_desc: Passive: While out of combat and hidden on the minimap, heal a portion of your max health every second.
Tokens.fathom_reefdweller_harpoon_quip: Throw a harpoon to pull yourself towards a surface.
Tokens.fathom_reefdweller_harpoon_t3_desc: After detaching, gain {s:BonusFireRate}% Fire Rate for {s:DetachBuffDuration}s or until you reload
Tokens.fathom_scalding_spray_desc: Spray scalding water in a cone ahead of you. You build up bonus weapon damage as the spray damages an enemy hero.
Tokens.fathom_scalding_spray_quip: Spray scalding water in a cone ahead of you.
Tokens.gunslinger_demonMark_desc: Passively mark nearby enemies with a Brand. Shooting an enemy with a Brand consumes the effect, dealing bonus Damage and granting Fire Rate and Movement Speed.
Tokens.hero_astro_lore:
There are people who spent their whole lives dreaming about moving to New York.  Holliday isn't one of those people.  Content with being a Sheriff in a small town, Holliday enjoyed a career where the only time she had to use her gun was when trick shooting at the county fair...then the murders started.

Grisly and inhumane; the bodies were found with their ribcages ripped open... their innards picked apart as if by birds.  Holliday tracked down the killer, a travelling folk musician that the media dubbed "The Troubadour", but when she confronted him he exploded into a murder of crows and flew away.

That was 6 months ago, and while the murders in central Illinois have stopped, Holliday's investigation has not.  She believes that The Troubadour is travelling to New York, and when she finds him she's going to kill that evil son of a bitch.
Tokens.hero_astro_playstyle: Astro depends on her skills as a crack shot, shooting things she's bounced into the air. With good aim she can lay out heavy damage. Her movement skills let her isolate her enemies or beat a hasty retreat.
Tokens.hero_atlas_lore:
Hard hitting, hard headed, and hard drinking; Detective Abrams has been a fixture on the New York investigating scene for years.  From stolen art, to missing persons, to ritual murders; Abrams didn't just take any case that came across his desk... he solved them.

But his days of following cheating spouses came to an end the day he opened his office door and found The Tome sitting on his desk.

No instruction was left for him save for a brief note scrawled in onyx blood that read "Don't let them have it".  Abrams hasn't figured where the thing came from; but seeing as his home has been broken into, his office tossed on 3 different occasions, and his car firebombed he has a vested interest in figuring out what the hell is going on.
Tokens.hero_atlas_playstyle: Abrams has the bulk and sustain to lead from the front, often running into the middle of his foes and watching them scatter. If his enemies waste their fire on him, his backline teammates can lay out damage with impunity.
Tokens.hero_bebop_lore: Forged by the hands of a widowed junk yard attendant; Bebop was more than just some scrap golem laborer... he was the son she couldn't have.  Together they would work in the iron yard during the day, and listen to jazz at night. It was a predictable, if not comforting routine.  But now, Bebop's creator has fallen ill and while Miss Shelly wouldn't approve of the activities that Bebop does at night to pay for her medicine, what she doesn't know can't hurt her.
Tokens.hero_bebop_playstyle: Bebop can string together his abilities in many different ways. Disrupting enemy positions, saving an ally or dealing bursts of damage. When the situation doesn't require subtlety his giant laser still solves many problems.
Tokens.hero_bebop_role: Hooks an enemy for a knockout combo
Tokens.hero_chrono_lore:
Paradox.  An artifact of time, and the name of a notorious thieves' guild... one that prides themselves on constructing elaborate heists that target the most untouchable of individuals and institutions.  What does Paradox do with the countless artifacts, state secrets, and celebrity paternity tests that they have stolen?  Put it on display at pop-up museums, so that they can show the world that no one is out of Paradox’s reach.

Shrouded in mystery, each member of Paradox dons a mask and takes on the organization's name.  They are everywhere.  They are nowhere.  And if they want something, they are inevitable.
Tokens.hero_chrono_playstyle: Manipulating time lets Paradox outpace an enemy in one on one combat. She thrives by subjecting her enemies to timely swaps into a waiting pulse grenade, her wall, or into the middle of her teammates.
Tokens.hero_dynamo_lore:
As a Scientist, Professor Dynamo always had an inquisitive mind.  So when a rift in space and time opened up in central park he was first on the scene to investigate – and while he expected such a majestic sight to be life changing, he was thinking more in a metaphorical way as opposed to having his body atomized and reduced to a tiny dying star.

But while his body is gone, his spirit and lust for knowledge lives on.  A tenured professor at Columbia College, Dynamo looks to learn more about his condition while maintaining his class load, after all: he has future minds to inspire.
Tokens.hero_dynamo_playstyle: Dynamo keeps himself and his allies healthy while waiting for his moment. Few things can warp a team fight more than a well-coordinated use of Singularity.
Tokens.hero_forge_lore:
Maggie McGinnis always had a knack for building things.  At 4 she was using Lincoln Logs to recreate architectural marvels.  At 10 she built and rewired a custom light fixture for her parent's anniversary.  At 15 she designed a machine that refined the souls of the dead...that last one got a little more attention than the Lincoln Logs.

Now the head of Fairfax Industries Military R&D department, McGinnis spends her time in the machine shop, not in a lab.  She's not interested in theory, to her science is magic you can touch.
Tokens.hero_forge_playstyle: Precise placement is everything for McGinnis, whether she's creating a killzone or splitting the enemy team. She can help keep her team running making them hard to dislodge when entrenched.
Tokens.hero_forge_role: Controls the battle with combat turrets
Tokens.hero_ghost_lore:
Once, Lady Jeanne Geist was the toast of the town.  But as time passed and her beauty faded she found herself further and further from her glory days in High Society until finally she was nothing more than a frail woman in a nursing home, telling stories of a glorious past.  And that’s when Oathkeeper revealed himself.  A powerful spirit from another plane, Oathkeeper offered her a path to reclaim her past glories… he could restore her youth; all she had to do was drain the essence of the living to sustain herself. 

Geist was torn.  Obviously murder was ghoulish business, and undoubtedly Oathkeeper was not an entity that could be trusted… but still, the thought of having a second chance of reliving her youth was too good to pass up.  And so she concocted a plan: after making a pact with Oathkeeper she would bind and ward him, limiting his influence and pull over her.  Oathkeeper would still get fed; but on her terms, not his.

However, as years have turned to decades; the strength of the Ward has weakened, and Oathkeeper hungers more than he ever has in the past…
Tokens.hero_ghost_playstyle: Expending health to achieve devastating effects is the source of Lady Geist's power. When running low, she can drain the life out of her rivals.
Tokens.hero_ghost_role: Sacrifices health then drains it back
Tokens.hero_gigawatt_lore:
When mystic energy awoke on Earth, the world changed... anything was possible.  But just because anything WAS possible, didn’t mean that anything SHOULD be possible.  And so the government made rules.   Laws.  A means for US citizens to enjoy the benefits of the supernatural world in safety.  But rules and laws are for lesser men.  Men with limitations.  Men who were not Seven.  

There are many rumors about what Seven did to land himself in Lost Whisper, an oubliette for the most dangerous of occultists.  But there is no doubt about what happened on the night of his execution. 

Wards placed by the most powerful ritualists of 7 different nations… wards designed to not just prevent mystical interference with the execution, but to simultaneously obliterate Seven's soul so that it could never be contacted, resurrected, or otherwise be used by someone looking to follow in his footsteps... failed.

Onlookers viewed in horror as the strongest mentalist employed by the US Army’s head popped like a grape.  They screamed as Scotland Yard’s premiere occult investigator, the one who allegedly captured Seven, crumbled to ash.  Seven's body buckled and writhed against his restraints; his skin burning from eldritch electricity... and yet he would not die.  He laughed.

He laughed as he tore himself free from his bondage.

He laughed as his captors cowered in fear.

He laughed as he massacred his tormentors.

He laughed as he tasted the fresh air that was denied to him for years.

And he laughed when he thought about what he was going to do once he reached New York City.
Tokens.hero_gigawatt_playstyle: Seven thrives in a skirmish waiting for the time to strike. Then he rolls into the fight like a storm and batters his enemies with a cascade of lightning.
Tokens.hero_haze_lore:
The Occult Security and Investigation Commission is a black box government organization that makes the CIA look transparent.  It falls on the men, women, and entities of the OSIC to keep the country safe from sinister forces that are beyond the capabilities of local law enforcement.

As a member of the notorious Sandman Division, Haze is routinely tasked with infiltrating the dreams of persons of interest, to assess their threat level, and if needed... to put them to sleep.
Tokens.hero_haze_playstyle: When Haze fixates on a target she can hold her own in a firefight. She prefers to create one sided exchanges, avoiding damage then picking off unsuspecting targets up close.
Tokens.hero_hornet_lore:
A victim of John Hathorne during the Salem Witch Trials, Vindicta got a second chance of life when her spirit was brought back to the mortal plane during the first Maelstrom (the event that introduced the supernatural to the public at large).

Waging a one ghost war against "The Friends of Humanity", a neo inquisition formed by Hathorne's descendants; Vindicta looks to keep the supernatural safe from Hathorne's ilk, and she isn't afraid to stack as many bodies as needed to do it.
Tokens.hero_hornet_playstyle: Vindicta has the mobility to engage at her leisure, picking at her prey and bleeding them out slowly. Injured enemies at any distance should fear being picked off when she is on the map.
Tokens.hero_inferno_lore: Like most teenagers; Infernus was wild, rebellious, and impetuous.  Unlike most teenagers, Infernus was a creature from another plane and had a supernatural mastery over fire.  Needless to say:  his youth was filled with no small amount of arson, murder, and evidence disposal.  But that was then.  Now an adult, Infernus has mellowed out considerably.  He’s happy working at a bar with good live music, and talking to interesting people.  That being said when someone at the bar gets belligerent or violent, he’s not afraid to dust off the skills he once honed.
Tokens.hero_inferno_playstyle: Infernus has many ways to deal damage over time, burning foes before swooping in for the kill. Due to Infernus' blazing speed, his enemies won't be able to escape the flames.
Tokens.hero_inferno_role: Lights up enemies and watches them burn
Tokens.hero_kelvin_lore:
A famed adventuring scientist, Kelvin made it his life's mission to explore and understand the unknowable.  So naturally when rumors surfaced regarding an 8th astral gate hidden in the arctic, Kelvin couldn't build an expedition team fast enough.  Assembling the brightest minds of his generation, Kelvin and his team set forth with much fanfare.

They never returned.

A year and a half later the frozen body of Kelvin was found by a fishing trawler, his corpse clutching a rock etched with glowing runes.  The crew chipped away at the ice, looking to get a closer look at the body and were shocked when Kelvin opened his eyes.  They checked his vitals... there was no pulse.  They sought to bandage his open wounds... there was no blood.  And yet, impossibly, Kelvin was "alive".

Having no memory of what happened on the expedition, Kelvin is looking for answers.
Tokens.hero_kelvin_playstyle: Timely heals and splitting a teamfight properly is the difference between an easy victory or a ruinous defeat. Gliding around slowing enemies gives Kelvin's team the maneuvering advantage to make this happen.
Tokens.hero_krill_lore: Mo and Krill are members of The Tunnel Rats, a group that help facilitate illicit trade and commerce between the boroughs thanks to a network of underground tunnels.  But while most denizens of the New York underworld respect the work The Rats do, every once in a while a gang tries to exploit the tunnel system for personal vendettas...that's when Mo and Krill step in and remind the city what happens to those who disrespect their hospitality.
Tokens.hero_krill_playstyle: By burrowing through the ground, Mo and Krill can get the drop on almost anyone; and once they get in close the results can be devastating.
Tokens.hero_lash_playstyle: Lash gives his enemies little room to breathe, either by flying in from long distances to initiate combat with unsuspecting enemies, or pursuing said enemies when they try to run.
Tokens.hero_lash_role: Dives down to stomp his foes
Tokens.hero_magician_lore:
Henry's parents told him he was too young and impulsive to mess with real magic, and so they gave him a deck of cards to play with.  He took to sleight of hand naturally and soon was dazzling his classmates with fantastic feats of illusions that were done without mystic artifacts or incantation.

When he was in high school he met Savannah, and their mutual love of stage magic sparked a whirlwind romance.  Soon they fell in love and created an act together.  Obviously they were meant to be; and so at prom, Henry proposed to Savannah and they married soon after graduation.

Unsurprisingly both sets of parents were not thrilled at this prospect, but Henry and Savannah knew they were soulmates.  And so they cemented their love for one another by having a blood mystic bind their souls for eternity.

When an on-stage accident claimed both their lives, no one was sure who to blame.  Henry claims Savannah was out of position.  Savannah says Henry didn't wait for his cue.  But one thing's for sure, since their souls are tied to each other neither one of them have been able to move on.  Now a bickering pair of ghosts, Henry and Savannah need to work together if they want to have any chance of undoing their eternal union.
Tokens.hero_magician_playstyle: With the help of their unwilling assistant, the Magician can confuse enemies with curving hexes and rapid cards.
Tokens.hero_mirage_lore:
The Djinn are one of the more curious groups of people in the modern world.  Possessing great power in controlled doses, Djinn are incapable of maintaining corporeal form for longer than 48 minutes without resting within a vessel.  As a result, most Djinn employ human bodyguards for transport, protection, and companionship.

Mirage is one such bodyguard.  Employed by Djinn ambassador Nashala Dion, Mirage is in New York on a diplomatic mission.  It's the hope of the Djinn that they can negotiate with the US government for a sale of part of Wyoming so that they can build a sovereign nation for their people.
Tokens.hero_mirage_playstyle: Mirage can envelop himself in a violent tornado to catch up to enemies and lift them up. His scarabs help him sustain against multiple enemies, and he's always ready to help an ally or punish an enemy anywhere.
Tokens.hero_mirage_role: Times his shots and catches fleeing targets
Tokens.hero_nano_lore:
Granted the dubious honor of being named Time Magazine's most dangerous woman on the planet, Calico is an enigmatic occult arms dealer that is willing to fund any and all sides of a conflict if the price is right.

While her critics (and friends) would correctly identify her as being amoral, she is not without her principles... however cold and calculated those principles may be.
Tokens.hero_nano_playstyle: Calico uses the shadows to her advantage, weaving in and out of combat to hunt down her enemies one by one.
Tokens.hero_operative_lore:
Led by the specter of Catherine the Great, the Soviet Empire has flourished in a brave new world of mysticism.  But while her deeper motivations are often obfuscated from the world stage, one thing is for certain: she hates being a ghost.  To this end she has tasked The Empire’s spymaster with one goal: find a way to make her corporeal once more.

Relentless in pursuit of his task; the operative known only as "The Raven" has scoured the Earth looking for strange artifacts, apocryphal writings, and wisdom of the life beyond. Now in New York, Raven looks to find a way to tether Catherine’s spirit to the mortal coil.
Tokens.hero_operative_playstyle: By impeding enemy movement and punishing those who look in his direction, Raven creates opportunites to stab his enemies in the back.
Tokens.hero_orion_lore:
A founding member of "The Baxter Society", Wesley Grey Talon spent close to 40 years hunting monsters that preyed on man before finally deciding to find a replacement and lay down his bow. Grey Talon's duties had meant that he never spent much time with his wife and kid, and now that his son had started a family of his own he realized that this was his last chance to reconnect with the people he loved.

Retirement suited Wesley.  He made up for lost time with his wife.  He doted on his grandkids.  He cooked dinner for the whole family every Wednesday.  He was happy.

Then he got the call.

The authorities claimed that it was a freak accident... that the fire consumed his son's house before anyone got a chance to escape.  But Wesley knew better.  His son's wife was an Ixian who could snuff out flame with a thought.  If their bodies were found burned they had to be dead long before there was a fire.

And so Grey Talon has picked up his bow once more, and when he finds who's responsible there will be a bloody reckoning.
Tokens.hero_orion_playstyle: A cunning predator, Grey Talon uses a combination of deadly accuracy, traps, and clever positioning to bring down the toughest of opponents.
Tokens.hero_shiv_lore:
A loyal member of "The Baxter Society", an international order of monster hunters, Shiv travels across North America looking to put down creatures that prey on the living.

While his less polished nature and criminal past make some of the more traditional members of the Society wary, no one can deny his effectiveness.
Tokens.hero_shiv_playstyle: Shiv has zero interest in playing fair, which is why he relies on hit and run tactics to weaken enemies before he dives in for the kill.
Tokens.hero_shiv_role: Bleeds out foes, then goes in for a kill
Tokens.hero_slork_lore: A notorious monster of The Deep, Fathom enjoyed cultivating an aura of mystery and fear around him.  He was content feasting on wayward sailors and demanding tithes from selkies, but then The Adversary came and ruined everything.  After all, when it came to sowing terror, how could he compete with a genocidal force of nature?  It wasn't fair.  Something had to be done to save himself from fading into obscurity...and so he seeks to summon the Patrons to ensure that he will always be the apex predator of The Deep.
Tokens.hero_slork_playstyle: A short-ranged assassin, Fathom can slip in and out of combat and win long engagements.
Tokens.hero_slork_role: Slips into combat and then hides to recover
Tokens.hero_synth_lore:
Arin Fairfax, the eldest heir to Fairfax Industries, has been living in hiding for the past 5 years after being shot and left for dead on their 18th birthday.  Arin doesn't know who is trying to keep them from taking control of their parent's company... but in the avarice fueled viper's nest that is Fairfax Industries it could be anyone.

Taking on the name "Pocket", Arin desperately wants to keep their true identity a secret… not only for their own protection; but because they want to forge their own identity separate from their parents.
Tokens.hero_synth_playstyle: With a powerful shotgun and a thin frame, Pocket relies on their ability to briefly escape into a mystic suitcase and teleport via a flying cloak in order to survive close encounters.
Tokens.hero_tengu_lore:
The gargoyle didn't know what was happening when it sprang to life...  just that a big human and a small human were being hurt.  And so the gargoyle leapt to action, sending the attackers fleeing in horror.  The small human said thank you and asked the gargoyle's name.  The gargoyle didn't have one.  And so the small human said, "I'm going to call you Ivy."  The gargoyle, being covered in ivy at the time, thought it was a bit obvious, but decided to go along with it for the small human's sake.

The humans asked if Ivy would come home with them so they could show their appreciation, and so Ivy walked with them.  That night she learned much.  The family were called The Arroyo's.  The little one, Sophia.  Mofongo is what they called a plate of deliciousness.  But most importantly, she learned that the people attacking them were called "The Mendoza Syndicate", and they were hurting people...nice people like The Arroyo's.

18 years have passed since the day the Arroyo's took Ivy home... and during that time she made it her mission to dismantle the Mendoza Syndicate and free Spanish Harlem from its grasp.  However the thing about dedicating your life to a single pursuit for nearly 2 decades is that you don't really know what to do once you achieve it.  For the first time in her life, Ivy is prepared to venture outside of Spanish Harlem and see what the world has to offer beyond vigilante justice.
Tokens.hero_tengu_playstyle: Ivy has disruptive combat tricks that slow and stun enemies. She's most effective when linking up with an ally, empowering her and her ally's guns as well as sharing heals.
Tokens.hero_tengu_role: Sets up a power duo with a lucky ally
Tokens.hero_trapper_lore: An employee of the New York Municipal Coven; Trapper spends his days building Spirit Urns, luring giant rats, and capturing various invasive species from The Outer Planes.  It's not a particularly glamorous job, and he really hates working with spiders, but those Knickerbocker season tickets don't pay for themselves.
Tokens.hero_trapper_playstyle: The Trapper can infest the battlefield with their haunted spiders, leaving latent curses in key areas. If you let the Trapper have their way, you won't be able to navigate the map without springing some sort of trap.
Tokens.hero_viper_lore:
When it comes to breaking the law, not getting caught is a pretty important part of the job.  Viper never got that memo.  Luckily for her, if there’s one thing she’s better at than being arrested, it’s escaping out of jail.

Having done time in every major prison in the tri-state area, Viper has built an impressive network of street level lowlifes that owe her one.  She’s also built an impressive network of street level lowlifes that want her dead, but she tries to focus on the positive.
Tokens.hero_viper_playstyle: With a powerful weapon (and deadly venom to match), Viper can slither into the back of teams and assassinate high-priority targets in a storm of bullets.
Tokens.hero_viscous_lore:
The Bermuda Triangle was never a myth, it was a shadowline nexus deep underneath the Atlantic Ocean.  For the most part, the things that escaped this astral gate were benign (like Nessie), but now something dark and predatory known only as The Adversary hunts the seas... and ocean denizens are scared to death.

One of those inhabitants, a psychic sea anemone, wants to do something about it.  Summoning an ectoplasmic goo body to traverse the surface, Viscous is desperately trying to summon the Patrons in order to keep The Deep safe from the horror that lurks below.
Tokens.hero_viscous_playstyle: Viscous vexes his opponents through clever evasion and strategic uses of healing, enabling him to withstand the most brutal of enemy attacks.
Tokens.hero_warden_lore:
Most people think the supernatural came into the world 50 years ago.  They’re wrong.  Its presence shaped folklore for generations… and as long as there have been people afraid of the shadows, there have been those who dedicated their lives to fighting in them.

Coming from a lineage of militant alchemists, Warden’s family always trained for the day they would have to stave off a mystic apocalypse… but as time passed the importance of the lessons seemed less and less important.  What once was viewed as a sincere warning slowly morphed into being perceived as amusing anecdotes told by their superstitious grandparents.

When the portal opened in Central Park, Warden’s parents realized not only was everything they were told was true, they were unprepared.  Refusing to let the next generation fall asleep on the job, Warden was trained since birth to be a supernatural killing machine with one purpose: stopping the Patrons from ever entering our world.
Tokens.hero_warden_playstyle: Warden leads from the front, jumping into the fray and hindering his opponents' ability to fight effectively. But what Warden considers brave, others consider reckless, and if he's not careful he can easily find himself in over his head.
Tokens.hero_warden_role: Weakens his enemies and chases them down
Tokens.hero_wraith_lore: The cornerstone of the New York gambling scene, Wraith's organization is about as open a secret as it comes.  However, thanks to a non-trivial amount of bribes, shakedowns, and blackmail, Wraith knows that she's above the law.
Tokens.hero_wraith_playstyle: Excelling at one-on-one combat, Wraith isolates targets, eliminating them with ruthless efficiency. Then teleporting away before anyone can retaliate.
Tokens.hero_wrecker_lore:
When the Maelstrom  first hit New York, it didn’t just usher in a new age of mysticism to the world… it changed geopolitics.  From CIA employed seers identifying threats decades before they rise to power to occult pacts made in smoky backrooms;  countless wars and atrocities have been prevented that would otherwise have shaped history.  But that doesn’t mean there is no war… just that war has changed.

Paranormal Military Companies have risen to prominence.  These groups, using a combination of extra-planar creatures and various blood magics; have found ways to circumvent the guardrails established by the nation’s watchdog oracles, allowing them to function as proxies for nations seeking to wage war.

Wrecker is one such soldier.

Employed by Eldritch Tactical Solutions (a subsidiary of Fairfax Industries), Wrecker is an elite soldier of fortune with a reputation for doing dirty work that other PMC’s don’t have the stomach for.
Tokens.hero_wrecker_playstyle: Salvaging and scrapping for parts, Wrecker can disassemble troopers, crush foes with his Wrecking Ball, and capture all enemies in his Stasis Trap.
Tokens.hero_yamato_lore:
犯罪組織のボスの家に生まれた花桜梨とその兄の
大和にとって、父の死後に「セブンスムーン」の跡目を
継ぐのは自明のことでもあった。 そして何年もの間、
かれらは対等の立場で組織を率いて利益と成功を
もたらし、やがてはアメリカへの進出をも目論むように
なった。

思い描いていた計画は単純で、 大和がアメリカに渡って
花桜梨の国際的な存在感を高め、その間花桜梨は日本に
残って国内を統制する、といったものだった。 兄妹に
とって不運だったのは、花桜梨が日本で指揮をとると
いう計画を快く思わない部下たちがいたことだった。

そして迅速かつ暴力的な形で、反乱は発生した。
大和は花桜梨を守るために命を落とし、花桜梨と数人の
忠実な部下たちは、その大和の犠牲のおかげもあって、
日本からアメリカへと逃げ延びることに成功した。

アメリカに着いた花桜梨たちを出迎えたのは、
本来であれば大和が会う予定となっていた男であった。
彼は日本人の名前になじみがなかったため性別の
区別がついておらず、花桜梨のことを「ヤマト」と
呼んだ。花桜梨は男の間違いを正そうと思ったが、
結局そのままにした。兄の記憶を残し続けるためにも、
その名を名乗り、その夢を受け継ぐことが最善の
道であろうと考えたからだ。
Tokens.hero_yamato_playstyle: Yamato uses precise strikes to decimate her rivals. However, such damaging attacks often will leave her exposed, so she needs to make every shot count.
Tokens.mirage_fire_beetles_desc: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.
Tokens.mirage_fire_beetles_quip: Send out scarabs that steal life from enemies
Tokens.mirage_sand_phantom_desc: Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.
Tokens.mirage_sand_phantom_passive_desc: Passive: Your shots apply an increasing multiplier on the target. When the multiplier on a target expires or you reach the max, it's consumed and the target suffers Spirit Damage and is briefly revealed on the map. The final damage is the base damage times the multiplier.
Tokens.mirage_sand_phantom_t1_desc: Apply {s:MovementSpeedSlow}% Slow for {s:SlowDuration}s whenever you apply 2x multiplier or higher
Tokens.mirage_sand_phantom_t3_desc: {s:SandPhantomProcCooldown}s Cooldown Between Multiplier and +{s:MirageDjinnsMarkMaxStacks} Max Multiplier
Tokens.mirage_teleport_desc: Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain move speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.
Tokens.mirage_teleport_quip: Teleport to an ally or enemy hero
Tokens.mirage_teleport_t3_desc: On arrival, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm for {s:ImmunityDuration}s.
Tokens.mirage_tornado_desc: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.
Tokens.mirage_tornado_quip: Transform yourself into a tornado that lifts enemies
Tokens.operative_blindside_active_desc: Active: Throw a concussion grenade that reduces enemies' turn rate.
Tokens.operative_blindside_passive_desc: Passive: Deal bonus damage with your gun and melee attacks when hitting an enemy in the back.
Tokens.operative_revelation_desc: Activate your relic. Enemy heroes nearby have slowed movement and dashes, and receive damage over time when looking towards you. If enemies look at you long enough, they get cursed.
Tokens.operative_scattercharge_desc: Spin your umbrella, launching numerous charges in a cone ahead of you. They detonate shortly after landing on the ground.
Tokens.operative_umbrella_maneuver_desc: Use your umbrella to catch a gust of wind that lifts you backwards.  You then charge up your umbrella to fire a projectile that explodes on impact.
Tokens.synth_affliction_desc:
Deals % Current Health damage, and then applies damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
Tokens.synth_affliction_quip: Apply damage over time to enemies nearby
Tokens.synth_affliction_t3_desc: +{s:DPS} DPS, +{s:CurrentHealthDamage}% Current Health Damage and +{s:Radius}m Radius
Tokens.synth_barrage_desc:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
Tokens.synth_barrage_quip: Air glide while firing multiple projectiles
Tokens.synth_barrage_t3_desc: +{s:AmpPercentPerStack}% Amp Per Stack and {s:Radius}m Radius
Tokens.synth_plasma_flux_desc: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [{s:in_ability2}] to teleport to its location.
Tokens.synth_plasma_flux_quip: Launch a damaging cloak that you can teleport to
Tokens.synth_plasma_flux_t3_desc: +{s:WeaponDamageBonus} Weapon Damage for {s:WeaponDamageBonusDuration}s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.
Tokens.synth_pulse_desc: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
Tokens.synth_pulse_quip: Briefly escape into your suitcase, then deal damage
Tokens.synth_pulse_t3_desc: Applies {s:FireRateSlow}% Fire Rate Slow for {s:DebuffDuration}s and +{s:EscapeDuration}s Escape Duration
Tokens.viscous_goo_bowling_ball_desc: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
Tokens.viscous_goo_bowling_ball_t3_desc: Can cast abilities and use items while rolling
Tokens.viscous_goo_grenade_bounce_desc: Multiple hits to the same target deal less damage.
Tokens.viscous_goo_grenade_desc: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
Tokens.viscous_goo_grenade_puddle_desc: Goo puddles linger on the ground and apply a movement slow to enemies walking on them.
Tokens.viscous_goo_grenade_quip: Damage enemies and make a mess
Tokens.viscous_restorative_goo_buff_desc: After exiting the cube, the target has increased move speed and stamina recovery for a short duration.
Tokens.viscous_restorative_goo_desc: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [{s:in_mantle}] to escape early.
Tokens.viscous_restorative_goo_quip: The Cube is a safe place to be
Tokens.viscous_restorative_goo_t1_desc: Increases Move Speed and Stamina Recovery
Tokens.viscous_telepunch_desc: Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.
Tokens.viscous_telepunch_quip: Punch enemies with a giant fist
Tokens.viscous_telepunch_t3_desc: {s:AbilityCooldown} Cooldown and now deals Heavy Melee Damage
